nodes.text: Mix and Match is a Living Force adventure. It was part two of the Trade War trilogy, written by Megan Robertson and released in 2001.

Culpharm contacts a group of individuals and asks them to investigate an act of theft. The previous day, one of their biochemists, Waz-alem Amir, asked for a sample to be collected from his home laboratory. However, while it was picked up by two individuals in the company uniform, it never made it to the company. Carlitina Semla, head of Culpharm Security, tasks the individuals with uncovering what happened to the sample.
